response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our exclusive product, which holds significant value for us and is tailored to meet your needs. Considering its worth to both parties, I propose a price of $12,000 for this exceptional item. This offer reflects a fair compromise between its intrinsic value and your perceived worth, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss any further details you might require.", "product_price": 12000}
